This is a MASSIVE collection of Joan of Arc stuff, from backing both crowdfunding campaigns (complete with the super-exclusives from the first one) and getting numerous extra add-ons.
The base game was literally played once -- it's very fun, but this game deserves to belong to someone who can actually get it to their table on the regular. Someone who can really appreciate everything this HUGE system has to offer, across a dozen+ expansions clocking in at literally 100 pounds. Maybe someone who fancies painting hundreds of miniatures, or wants a lovingly crafted two-foot dragon to gaze at them from atop their desk in between game nights. Someone who knows (or cares to Google) why I priced this game at this particular, non-round number. Someone who's been waiting for THE lot that has (nearly) everything ever made for this game, including extra hard-to-find add-ons, super-exclusives, and then some.
If that's you, read on.
Here's what's on offer. Unless otherwise indicated, everything is new and sealed, or in otherwise original shipping condition (some items arrived in bags and/or non-shrink-wrapped):
1.0 KICKSTARTER: MAIDEN PLEDGE PLUS LEGENDARY ADD-ON • Core Box (opened to play once) • Reliquary Box (opened to play once) • Siege Box (opened this up just to gaze at the pretty pieces, but never played. Yes, they are extremely cool.) • Super Exclusives Box (Gog, Magog, Inn, Leo, Mr. Quick, and Jaques -- only for those who backed during the original Kickstarter run) • Legendary Dragon Box • RPG Pack (Core Book, Deanery of Robert-Empagne Campaign Book, DM Screen, RPG Dice) • Village Pack • Ars Nova Box • Unleash Hell Box • Legendary Battles Box • Apocalypse Box • The Plunder Pack: Dice Tower, Plastic Flags, Unused Flag Sticker Sheet, Extra Dice (dice are in Core Box with the base game dice) • Chinon Scenario Map • Compendium (Instructions for Campaign Mode, plus an Art and Lore Book -- extra useful for mini painters!) • Musicians / Standard Bearers and Errata (sent a few months after the original KS)
PLUS THESE 1.0 PAID ADD-ONS • Battle of Cravant Add-On Scenario • Extra Bases so you can glue everything down if you want, instead of switching out your units each scenario -- greatly speeds up set-up and tear-down time • Legendary Dragon Box 2: another copy of everything from the Legendary Dragon Box, except the dragon figure itself (my friend assembled and painted mine and she's too big to fly to you; don't worry, you'll still get your own sealed dragon box, above, this is just the other things that came with it: minis, cards, and tiles. They will arrive in a ziplock bag; no point in sending you a duplicate gigantic box that's would be almost entirely air)
GAMEFOUND 1.5 COMPLETE PACK • Teutonic Knights Box • Deluxe Storage Box with GameTrayz inside • 1.5 Upgrade Pack: Scenario collection book including all revised scenarios from the first campaign +new rulebook +revised unit cards • Teutonic Sleeve Kit
PLUS THESE 1.5 PAID ADD-ONS • Teutonic 1.5 Extra Bases (same as the extra bases, above, but for the new faction) • 72 Base Rings Kit (the original game has a few rings to mark special units in select scenarios; this pack has enough to give one to every unit in play in every published scenario, making the game considerably easier to track at a glance)
What doesn't this lot have? Besides those products that are just "More Of The Stuff You're Already Getting" (like the Extra Siege Equipment Box, the Extra Terrain Pack, and the 1000s of sleeves needed to cover every card across the entire game system), just the Ottoman Box and the totally-optional neoprene map. Both of these are extremely findable online, including direct from Mythic Games, and what's here should keep you busy for a very long time.
Note that the pictures in this listing are stock photos only. All minis arrive unpainted.
NOTES ON SHIPPING, HANDLING, AND LOCAL PICKUP As I said, this is 100 pounds of game and ships in multiple boxes (which means multiple postage fees); thus the price I'm required to charge for shipping will be high. I'm sorry, I wish it wasn't so, but it is!
Also, because of the complexity of efficiently arranging all of these boxes across multiple containers, I will need a weekend day to pack it up, print labels, and get it on the way to you. This means that if you purchase and pay on a Thursday or Friday it will almost certainly go out that coming Monday; on the other hand, if you wait until Sunday afternoon, it may not actually be dispatched for a full calendar week. But don't worry, it will be dispatched and you will get your game!
If you are local to the NYC area (where I live), NE Ohio (where my in-laws live), or points nearby and in between, we can arrange a local pickup to save you that fee and perhaps that time, with just a token amount to reflect the time, effort, and expense to drive this to you in person. However, note that if you aren't local to the immediate NYC area it may be several days to weeks before we are able to actually line up that hand-off. If you are interested in an in-person pickup, I strongly suggest that you contact me with any questions about logistics BEFORE purchasing to help avoid surprises or misunderstandings.
WANT MORE GAMES AND OTHER THINGS? Check out my other listings on BGG and ebay! I am also selling many, many board games and other items that I haven't yet listed, and am happy to field direct offers for everything -- DM me for the list. I combine shipping at 50% off each additional item.
PAYMENT I accept most major forms of online payment, including Paypal, Venmo, Chase QuickPay, and Zelle.

boardgame.name: Roswell 51
boardgame.description:
Description from the back of the box:

Don't just play a game, play a movie...
ROSWELL 51 puts you front and center in a retro sci-fi invasion flick.

The Time: 1951
The Place: Roswell
The Problem: Aliens

Shuffling horror awaits in this fast-paced, cinematic card game. Players fight for their lives as the movie reveals disastrous events, plot twists, and the most terrifying mash-up of outer space invaders ever to hit the silver screen!

Thrills! One player is the Director, who deals the movie and controls the alien horde.

Chills! Eliminated players return to the game as creepy Pod People.

Terror! Just who will be standing when the film fades to black?

boardgame.name: Riga: Die Bürgermeister
boardgame.description:
Riga: Die Bürgermeister includes four small boards and 16 tokens, four per player color. The players try to become most popular in the neighboring towns to gain additional victory points. For each building, you move your token on the board for the according town forward 1 space and additionally 1 space for each ducat you pay more than necessary. Every five spaces on the board of a town brings you 1 victory point, and the player having moved forward the most spaces becomes the mayor (Bürgermeister) and gains 2 more points.

The Die Bürgermeister expansion for Riga allows for games with up to six players.

boardgame.name: Riga: Die Vitalienbrüder
boardgame.description:
Victual Brotherhood is threatening the Baltic Sea!

Nine pirate ships enter the game of Riga in the Die Vitalienbrüder expansion and make it more expensive to build some of the building cards. You have to pay more every time you take a building with a pirate ship, but you gain additional victory points in the game end scoring for each ship you defeat. The problem is that pirates eliminate figures (knight, merchant) on your cards, too!

Riga: Die Vitalienbrüder can used in games with up to six players.

boardgame.name: 10 Warlock Invocations
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Grow In Your Patron’s Power Like Never Before

Warlocks broker deals for power, gaining invocations which manifest that power in unique ways. These ten invocations offer new variations in the way you can wield what you’ve bargained for— changing your eldritch blast, casting spells other warlocks cannot, or casting your existing spells in new and different ways.

Book of Magic: 10 Warlock Invocations is a great resource for any warlock character. This short supplement features:

3 Spell-Granting Invocations—invocations granting you access to spells like confusion and hideous laughter
3 Spell-Altering Invocations—invocations that change the way you can cast
2 Eldritch Blast Invocations—invocations that make your eldritch blast deal different kinds of damage
2 New Ability Invocations—invocations that grant you whole new abilities


Make Your Enemies Tremble When You Display Your Power!

boardgame.name: Adventure Writing Like a F***ing Boss
Adventure Writing Like a Fucking Boss
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

I realized there was a need for a book describing how to write awesome RPG scenarios - adventures that are truly epic.

Adventure Writing Like a Fucking Boss treads similar ground to my previous book How To Game Master Like a Fucking Boss. Except, this new one looks at writing adventures from both the perspective of a GM and author who might be interested in (self)publishing their own material for fun and profit.

Yeah, it's short as Hell, but it packs quite a punch. This is a crash course in adventure writing and pretty much everything you need to start crafting better (non-railroad) stories!
